title: Kamarband
description: Warp-twined (LM) edge, Printed lining. Overall cross stitch in silk thread on a cotton ground. Applied woven bands form an edging on the four sides. Remnants of a tassel are seen at the center of one short side. The backing is red printed cotton fabric. Red, blue and white dominate.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
